name: customers_downsell_managed
description:
The total number of Managed customers with a Closed Won Renew Opportunity where  the expected Delta ARR is negative (< 0), indicating a negative change in ARR (Annual Recurring Revenue)  during a given time period.  This metric is intended to be reported at the fiscal-quarter-grain or higher, 
therefore, dimension values replace native time grains in this metric definition.
